songs.title: Tell Me*
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics from Snippet]

[Verse]
Don't tell me when I lose, tell me when I win
Don't tell me where I'm at, nigga, tell me where you been
Tell me you never tell me selfish shit again
Tell me to stay and tell me not to overspend
Tell me, tell me, tell me
Tell me work on all my habits
Tell me to relax or tell me when I'm being passive
Don't let me get no pass, make me own for my actions
Don't tell me 'bout my love if you ain't tell me how to match it
Tell me, tell me, tell that she fuck with me
Tell me she won't cheat on me
Tell me that she got me, shit, I swear she tell me anything
Tell me that you over us
Tell me that she ain't into me
No, you ain't gotta tell me, I can tell just by your energy
Tell me how to get the shit that I ain't never understood
Tell me how to fix the hood when I ain't never in the hood
Tell me when I'm doing wrong or tell me when I'm doing good
You ain't gotta tell it all, nigga, tell me what you could
Wish I could tell you how to live your life different
